channel.title: Port
channel.description: how do you change the port on the runescape classic server!?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 10:57:37 AM[/size][hr]... [br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 01:20:20 PM[/size][hr]help?

item.title: Port
item.dc:creator: @Wolfen_Sty Wolfen Sty
item.description:
@Wolfen_Sty wrote:

Hey man, you should delete this post and re-post it in the RSC section of the forum. If you don’t, people are going to flame the hell out of you. =P

Also, to change the port, you go to the log-in screen. Look right under where you type your Username and Password. It will show the Server (Same as IP) and the Port. Click on the port number, delete the current one (Which is the default 43594) and change it to what you want. Simple.

Read full topic
